message: Flexible Columns are here, along with more in Tweeten 4.1:
new: Flexible Columns: You can now set different sizes for every column. Use the new settings UI to make your columns bigger or smaller, and see the changes in real-time.
Notification and status updates have been redesigned
Improved user interface for video uploads
fixes: Minor design fixes for direct messages
Other small UI fixes throughout the app
issues: Old reply system no longer works
